paragraphs.body: DR Movie has an extensive portfolio of animation, both in South Korea and overseas.
paragraphs.text: DR Movie has an extensive portfolio of animation, both in South Korea and overseas.

paragraphs.body: DR Movie Co., Ltd. (Hangul: 디알무비) is a Korean animation studio established in Seoul, South Korea, in November 1990. The company has worked frequently with Japanese companies on anime titles, and since 1991 the studio has been in an exclusive partnership with Japanese animation studio Madhouse, who subsequently become a partial owner and investor in 2001. DR Movie has also worked extensively with ${link_0}, and in collaboration with ${link_1}, the company provided animation production services for Books ${link_2} and ${link_3} of ${link_4}, working on a total of 19 ${link_5}.
paragraphs.text: DR Movie Co., Ltd. (Hangul: 디알무비) is a Korean animation studio established in Seoul, South Korea, in November 1990. The company has worked frequently with Japanese companies on anime titles, and since 1991 the studio has been in an exclusive partnership with Japanese animation studio Madhouse, who subsequently become a partial owner and investor in 2001. DR Movie has also worked extensively with Nickelodeon, and in collaboration with JM Animation, the company provided animation production services for Books One and Two of Avatar: The Last Airbender, working on a total of 19 episodes.
